description: A deck of intricately designed tarot cards.  When you lay out your future they seem to be trying to tell you to take a leap of faith.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: An intricate occult seal.  When you glance at the bottom left corner you hear the sound of the ocean and smell the salty air the sea, and sense a river flowing through each point of the seal.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: An old style hurricane lamp.  The handle appears to made of vines covered in sharp thorns.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A box full of glass berries, when you get distracted you find yourself crunching them in your mouth.  Each one tastes like a mouthful of blood that slowly changes to espresso.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A polaroid of someone you remember going missing before the Cataclysm.  It caught a ton of media attention due to them being seen near what was shortly after identified as a thin place between dimensions.  The more you stare at the picture, the more you begin to see wounds appear and disappear on the person.  Sometimes they match your old scars.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A small jar with coffee, moving in weird patterns with no apparent cause.  After watching the swirls for some time, you are sure that it loops back on its movements, like some sort of message.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A red fabric blindfold with a cartoonish devil over the eyes.  You feel some anger when you put it on.  Did that devil just wink at you?
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A human heart grown in mother of pearl.  It beats loudly when you raise it to your ear.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A tiny human eye.  You can clearly see the green iris and red capillaries.  While holding it in the dark you feel it watching you.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A small, smooth part of the human brain.  Looks slippery.  Feels like rubber.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A tiny human skull.  His empty orbits are watching you.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A small ring.  There is nothing special about it, except the word "Republic" embossed on it.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A tiny human eye.  You can clearly see it has a blue iris and red capillaries.  You feel it can see you no matter how you hide.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

name.str_pl: copies of Enemy of the World

description: A small Korean novel, that describes the journey of an incredibly strong protagonist attempting to save the world.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A large, straight horn of some unknown creature.  It could easily injure a careless person.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: A long fleshy tendon with joints on both sides.  They contract from time to time.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: There is nothing here.  It's uncomfortable to hold it.
//scannable: not a book, but shouldn't be scannable

description: Two perfect spheres, where the first does not move at all, and second constantly rotates around.  You feel the connection to both of them.
